title: Universal Credit Statistics (NI)
description: Universal Credit is a new payment to help support households that are out of work or are on a low income. Universal Credit was introduced in Northern Ireland on a phased geographical basis from 27 September 2017.
datasetNotes: On landing page, scroll down to heading "Latest Universal Credit Publication" which has link to latest release page. Dataset on this new page under heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: Somewhat messy dataset - multiple tabs with tables, multiple tables in tabs. Multiple dimensions with footnotes present.
